BGSHOP_DESCRIPTION: Opens Sofi's shop to view all Backgrounds currently available for purchase
BGS_SLASH_DESC: Enter the code of the "Background" that you are looking for
APPLY_BG: Use the command `{{prefix}}buy bg <Background-ID> <Amount>` to buy a **Background**
NO_BG_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any **Background** with that ID
BGSHOP_EXTRA_INFO: Backgrounds can be applied to your 3D cards. Clicking on any name will open an image showcasing the specific Background
